sentence: Joshua Stein, a philosopher who studies antisemitism, pointed out on Twitter that two representatives in the caucus are Christians from Pennsylvania, Dan Meuser and Brian Fitzpatrick.
author: Noah Berlatsky
title: A Christian-led caucus 'protecting' Jewish values? No thanks.

sentence: Like I told him after, enjoy the hell out of how well you’re playing, man.” As easy as Scheffler seemed to make it look on Sunday, he wouldn’t have made it to the weekend had he not won a six-hole playoff over Matthew Fitzpatrick to escape the group stage.
author: Jon McCarthy
title: PGA TOUR: Scottie Scheffler wins match play, is new World No. 1 ... Third-place for Corey Conners ... Tiger sighting

sentence: After two weeks of intense testimony, the judge advised Assistant US Attorney Dennis Fitzpatrick to reconsider the strategy, warning that additional witnesses may be cumulative and ill advised.
title: Texas-born ISIS member - in federal custody after pleading guilty to terrorism charges - points to and identifies 'Beatle' El Shafee Elsheikh as fellow jihadist he met in Syria during dramatic court testimony
